dt: {bc}the process of segregating, elaborating, and releasing some material either functionally specialized (such as saliva) or isolated for excretion (such as urine)
{bc}a product of secretion formed by an animal or plant
{bc}one performing a specific useful function in the organism

et: French {it}sécrétion{/it}, from Latin {it}secretion-, secretio{/it} separation, from {it}secernere{/it} to separate {ma}{mat|secret|}{/ma}
shortdef: the process of segregating, elaborating, and releasing some material either functionally specialized (such as saliva) or isolated for excretion (such as urine)
a product of secretion formed by an animal or plant; especially : one performing a specific useful function in the organism
the act of hiding something : concealment
